Title: Le Dernier Combat (The Last Battle)
Actors: Pierre Jolivet, Jean Bouise, Fritz Wepper, Jean Reno
Plot: In the post-apocalyptic future, only a few humans are left. No one is able to speak; the film contains no dialogue, and characters communicate non-verbally. A determined loner befriends a reclusive older man and these two battle against vicious thugs for food, shelter and life itself.
